hymn.title: Our God is Eternal
hymn.chords: | Am - | Dm - | Am - | E7 - | Am - | E7 - | Am - | E7 - | Am - | Dm - | Am - | E7 - | Am - | E7 - | Am - | A7 - | Dm - | A7 - | Dm - | Dm - | Am - | Am - | G - | E - | Am - | Dm - | Am - | E7 - | Am - | E7 - | Am - | Am - |

layout.singingstanza: Our God is e -- ter -- nal, God's in -- vis -- i -- ble, The on -- ly, Al -- migh -- ty God is He! Have you heard Him, known Him? He's the great Cre -- a -- tor— Faints not, nev -- er is wea -- ry! Be -- fore the rug -- ged moun -- tains came forth— He was God! When He spoke, Then what -- e'er He said was done! Our God is e -- ter -- nal, God's in -- vis -- i -- ble, The on -- ly, Al -- migh -- ty God is He!
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2016 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: Our God is eternal, God's invisible, The only, Almighty God is He! Have you heard Him, known Him? He's the great Creator— Faints not, never is weary! Before the rugged mountains came forth—He was God! When He spoke, Then whate'er He said was done! Our God is eternal, God's invisible, The only, Almighty God is He!
